quilts.name: Bears and Bubbles
quilts.description: Beautifully made quilt with squares of blue cotton, white yellow flannel, and cotton squares with bears playing with bubbles detailed with ribbon accents and lace. The back of the quilt is similar colors. 2 inch ruffle border. Machine and hand sewn.

quilts.name: Blue and White Puppies
quilts.description: Beautifully made quilt with squares of baby blue cotton, white and blue puppies. The back of the quilt is similar colors. 2 inch ruffle border. Machine and hand sewn.

quilts.name: Blues Clues Applique
quilts.description: Beautifully made quilt of cotton and flannel squares of light blue, lavender, and a Blues Clues character pattern. The back of the quilt is mostly light blue with 3 assorted applique designs: a heart with daisy, two roses with a heart, and a large rose. Bows can be added upon request at no additional cost. 2 1/2 inch ruffle border.Machine and hand sewn.

quilts.name: Blues Clues
quilts.description: Beautifully made quilt of flannel squares of light blue, dark blue, and a Blues Clues character pattern. The back of the quilt is made entirely of the Blues Clues character material with yellow ribbon bow accents added. 2 1/2 inch ruffle border. Machine and hand sewn.

quilts.name: Bluebird Bungalow
quilts.description: A Scandinavian-inspired modern treehouse perched in the hills, complete with heated floors, minimalist décor, and stunning morning light.

quilts.name: Blues Clues
quilts.description: Tucked in a secluded grove, this cozy nest features a queen bed loft, wood-fired stove, and forest canopy hammock views.

quilts.name: TimberGlow Loft
quilts.description: A rustic-luxury loft with vaulted ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows, and a glass-enclosed rainfall shower suspended in the treetops.

quilts.name: Hummingbird Haven
quilts.description: Surrounded by flowering trees and birdsong, this light-filled retreat offers a swinging daybed, bamboo accents, and a forest spa tub.

quilts.name: Aurora Branch House
quilts.description: Perfect for northern lights viewing, this Arctic-inspired treehouse boasts heated glass panels, Nordic furnishings, and a wood sauna.

quilts.name: Willow Lantern Hideout
quilts.description: An enchanting escape illuminated by lantern light, this cozy perch features handcrafted willow furniture and a spiral staircase.

quilts.name: Foxglove Perch
quilts.description: Hidden among blooming foxglove and mossy trunks, this snug cabin includes a stone fireplace, built-in bookshelves, and a skylight above the bath.

quilts.name: The Lantern Lookout
quilts.description: Overlooking a peaceful lake, this compact luxury rental includes a full kitchenette, outdoor fire bowl, and swinging rope bridge access.

quilts.name: Cedar Spiral Cabin
quilts.description: This artistic treehouse features a cedar spiral staircase, rain-harvest shower, and a wraparound porch with sunset views.

quilts.name: Luna Loft
quilts.description: Designed for solo travelers or couples, Luna Loft offers a moonlit deck, indoor hammock nook, and built-in aromatherapy diffuser.

quilts.name: The Driftwood Roost
quilts.description: Blending coastal charm with treetop serenity, this hideaway features salvaged driftwood décor, ocean breezes, and a wine bar nook.
